Hermès

Discover all the collections of Hermès, fashion accessories, scarves and ties, belts and ready-to-wear, perfumes, watches and jewelry.
French high fashion luxury goods manufacturer established in 1837. It specializes in leather, lifestyle accessories, home furnishings, perfumery, jewellery, watches and ready-to-wear. Its logo, since the 1950s, is of a Duc carriage with horse. Nadège Vanhee-Cybulski is the current creative director.
Visit site

Oct 2–3, 2020 • Singapore

International
luxury market

Millionaire Bazaar integrates all sectors of national and international luxury industry
Produced by
General sponsor
Exclusive sponsor

EXCLUSIVE
EVENT

Our team is happy to present the new show event where those living a luxury lifestyle will be able to see and even purchase the best international luxury industry has to offer. Millionaire Bazaar is claiming itself as the largest show-exhibition slash trade event in modern luxury sector.

Our event gathers the key players in every segment of the luxury market including cars, yachts, jets, watches, jewellery, travel, interior design, cosmetics, health & beauty, sports, real estate, fashion designers, fashion brands, exclusive spirits and fine food, finance and banking, family office, concierge service and exclusive incentives.

Luxury Goods
& Service Exhibition
Property, Travel, Private Banking, Family Office, Сoncierge service

celebrities

Venue

We are taking over Singapore as leading Asian center to give all visitors and exhibitors a unique opportunity to join the world of the best local and international luxury goods and services expecting more than 20,000 guests to visit the expo, with 3,000 VIP guests.
Sands Expo &
Convention Centre

News

Start-up Atolla harnesses AI to make personalised skincare products
Data meets dermatology at Brooklyn-based skincare start-up Atolla, launched by an MIT engineer who has applied machine-learning algorithms to fix problem skin.
20 May 2019
Lilium aims to operate all-electric air taxis in several cities by 2025
German start-up Lilium has unveiled a five-seater jet-powered electric air taxi prototype that it plans to have operational in a number of cities around the world in the next six years.
20 May 2019

MQ Studio designs The PuXuan hotel inside Guardian Art Center in Beijing
A hotel has opened in the upper levels of the Ole Scheeren-designed art centre in Beijing, featuring rooms designed by MQ Studio to be warm and inviting.
8 March 2019
